name: Gloves Out
description:
Gloves Out  is a game where an Archaeologist finds two gloves and uses them to bend the elements to his will, while escaping a dungeon.

100% From scratch, zero assets used.
We had a much larger scope but got caught up and after working 41 of the 48 hours, we ran out of time. 

This game will be worked on an expanded upon (with bugfixes) post-gamejam!
